title: "Machine learning can accurately predict a scientist’s gender based on citation data alone"
excerpt: "Women and men have such different citation patterns that it is possible to accurately predict a scientist’s gender from such data alone. That’s the finding of a new study that investigates how men and women cite – and are cited by – their communities (Proc."
